flawed_nl_solution:
We know that 7-1=6 days the paper weighs 8 ounces
So those contribute 6*8=<<6*8=48>>48 ounces per week
So in total a weekly delivery of papers weighs 48+16=<<48+16=64>>64 ounces
That means it weighs 64/16=<<64/16=4>>4 pounds
So each week he delivers 4*250=<<4*250=1000>>1000 pounds of paper
So in 10, he delivers 1000*10=<<1000*10=100000>>100000 pounds of paper
That weighs 100000/2000=<<100000/2000=50>>50 tons of paper
So he makes 50*20=$50*20=1000>>1000 from recycling the paper
#### 1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10000, not 100000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
